headline.main: Opponents of the War Are Scarce on Television

lead_paragraph: It is not true that antiwar speakers are unwelcome on television news and talk shows. Bill O'Reilly, a talk show host on the Fox News Channel, recently invited a University of California graduate student, Ibrahim Ramey of the antiwar group Fellowship of Reconciliation, to explain why he thought it would be better to create an international justice system than bomb Afghanistan.
abstract: Article discusses reticence by networks to broadcast antiwar views and criticism of United States military operations in Afghanistan; photo (M)
